tasks.label: Cargo Clean all Crates
tasks.command: find . -name Cargo.toml -not -path "*-diff/*" -type f -exec dirname {} \; | xargs -t -I % cargo +nightly -C % clean

tasks.label: Corpus Reset
tasks.command: rm -rf $CODESPACE_VSCODE_FOLDER/corpus && mkdir $CODESPACE_VSCODE_FOLDER/corpus && cp $CODESPACE_VSCODE_FOLDER/Corpus.zip $CODESPACE_VSCODE_FOLDER/corpus/ && cd $CODESPACE_VSCODE_FOLDER/corpus && unzip Corpus.zip && rm Corpus.zip && cd $OLDPWD
